spec_data.Name: eclipse-eclemma
spec_data.Description:
EclEmma is a Java code coverage tool for Eclipse based on the EMMA Java
code coverage tool.  Features include launching from within the IDE,
coverage analysis summaries, and highlighting in Java source code
editors.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 08:23:37 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Java code coverage tool plugin for Eclipse
